I waved goodbye to Tom and the others, promising to return soon. The walk back to the main street was peaceful, and I couldn't help but feel a sense of contentment. es_results_raw: Luego de disfrutar de la cerveza, me sentí más animado para explorar más el jardín. Encontré un pequeño arroyuelo que corría entre las piedras, y su sonido relajante me llevó a pensar en la tranquilidad que este lugar ofrecía. Decidí sentarme a contemplar el paisaje, y mientras lo hacía, noté que el sol comenzaba a declinar, pintando el cielo con tonos anaranjados y rosados. Los mozos de cuadra, que parecían haberse relajado después del trabajo, me contaron historias sobre los caballos y los viajes que habían hecho. Uno de ellos, un anciano con una barba gris, me habló de un viaje que había hecho a las montañas, donde había visto un lobo solitario. Me fascinó la idea de un lobo en esas tierras, y no pude evitar preguntarle más sobre ello. A medida que la noche caía, el jardín se iluminaba con pequeñas luces que parecían surgir de la nada, creando un ambiente mágico y acogedor. Fue una de las noches más tranquilas y hermosas que recordaba haber pasado.

en_first_half: “Oh, he has his faults, too,” said Mr. Wilson. “Never was such a fellow for photography. Snapping away with a camera when he ought to be improving his mind, and then diving
en_second_half: down into the cellar like a rabbit into its hole to develop his pictures. That is his main fault, but on the whole he’s a good worker. There’s no vice in him.”
en_results_raw: of his nose into the latest issue of a photography magazine. He'd rather capture a fleeting moment with his camera than engage in a meaningful conversation. It's as if the world around him doesn't exist unless it's framed through the lens. His wife often sighs, wondering how they can reconnect when he's always chasing the perfect shot. Yet, there's something endearing about his passion, a spark that lights up his eyes whenever he talks about his latest project. Perhaps it's this very enthusiasm that makes him a good father, always eager to share his adventures with his children, even if it means missing a few family dinners. Despite his quirks, Mr. Wilson is a man of heart, and his love for photography is just another way he expresses his love for life.

en_first_half: “‘Why, what is it, then?’ I asked. You see, Mr. Holmes, I am a very stay-at-home man, and as my business came to me instead of my having to go to it, I was
en_second_half: often weeks on end without putting my foot over the door-mat. In that way I didn’t know much of what was going on outside, and I was always glad of a bit of news.
en_results_raw: “‘Why, what is it, then?’ I asked. You see, Mr. Holmes, I am a very stay-at-home man, and as my business came to me instead of my having to go to it, I was quite content with my life until this strange occurrence. It was a cold winter's night, and I had just returned from a meeting with a client when I noticed a peculiar light in my study. The light was flickering, as if someone was struggling with the door handle. My heart raced, and I quickly made my way to the door, only to find it locked from the inside. That’s when I heard the voice—low, urgent, and filled with fear. ‘Help me, please!’ I hesitated for a moment, but the sound of a key turning in the lock sent me into action. I opened the door to find a stranger, disheveled and pale, standing there, clearly in distress. ‘What’s happened?’ I asked, my curiosity now piqued. ‘I’ll tell you, but you must promise to keep this to yourself,’ the stranger said, his eyes wide with terror. ‘I’ve been following a trail of strange occurrences, and now I’m in real danger. I think someone is after me, and I need your help to uncover the truth.’ Mr. Holmes, I had no idea what to believe, but the look in his eyes told me he was already deep in thought, ready to embark on another of his thrilling adventures.”

Una noche, un cliente le confesó que había estado endeudándose para pagar las facturas de su negocio, que estaba a punto de fallar. Otro le contó que su esposa lo había abandonado y que necesitaba el dinero para mantenerse. Cada historia era diferente, pero todas compartían un hilo común: la desesperación. Holmes sabía que debía descubrir quién estaba detrás de este negocio y por qué operaban en esas horas tan tardías.

Hours passed, and before I knew it, the letter A was complete, a testament to the meticulous care and attention to detail that Mr. Duncan Ross had instilled in me. This was not just a lesson in penmanship; it was a lesson in patience, precision, and the importance of doing things right. As I looked around the room, I realized that everything was indeed as right as possible. The table was set, the air was still, and the world outside seemed to have paused, allowing me to focus solely on the task at hand. This moment, this lesson, would stay with me forever, a reminder of the value of preparation and the importance of doing things properly.

The tunnel's completion marked the end of one phase and the beginning of another, one that would see them vanish into the shadows, leaving no trace of their involvement. The question now was whether Mr. Wilson would be left behind or if they had a contingency plan to deal with him.

en_first_half: “To the Leadenhall Street Post Office, to be left till called for. He said that if they were sent to the office he would be chaffed by all the other clerks about having letters from a lady, so I offered to typewrite them, like he did his, but he wouldn’t have
en_second_half: that, for he said that when I wrote them they seemed to come from me, but when they were typewritten he always felt that the machine had come between us. That will just show you how fond he was of me, Mr. Holmes, and the little things that he would think of.”
en_results_raw: completion>He seemed uncomfortable with the idea of letters from a lady being seen by others, and I could understand his embarrassment. However, I insisted that it would be discreet, and I would ensure the typewriting was neat and professional. He finally agreed, but only on the condition that I used a different color ink than he did. That evening, I sat at my typewriter, choosing a shade of blue that I hoped would match his preference. As I typed each letter, I felt a strange mix of excitement and curiosity about the person who had prompted such a reaction from him. The task took longer than I expected, but when I finished, I felt a sense of accomplishment. The next day, I delivered the neatly typed letters to the post office, hoping they would reach their destination without any further incident. From that day on, I found myself looking forward to these occasional tasks, each one a small mystery wrapped in a simple envelope.

en_first_half: “He was a very shy man, Mr. Holmes. He would rather walk with me in the evening than in the daylight, for he said that he hated to be conspicuous. Very retiring and gentlemanly he was. Even his voice was gentle. He’d had the quinsy and swollen glands
en_second_half: when he was young, he told me, and it had left him with a weak throat, and a hesitating, whispering fashion of speech. He was always well dressed, very neat and plain, but his eyes were weak, just as mine are, and he wore tinted glasses against the glare.”
en_results_raw: Mr. Holmes, it seems that his health issues had significantly impacted his social life. He preferred the quiet and solitude of the evening, where he could walk without the fear of being noticed. His illness had made him more sensitive to the world around him, and he found comfort in the less crowded, more serene times of the day. His mannerisms reflected his inner turmoil; he was polite but distant, always maintaining a safe distance from others. Despite his shyness, he was deeply kind-hearted, often helping those in need without expecting anything in return. His voice, though gentle, carried a tone of wisdom and experience, as if he had seen much in his life. It was clear that his past had shaped him into the man he was, and his health struggles had only deepened his introspective nature. His story was one of resilience and quiet strength, a testament to the power of the human spirit to endure even in the face of adversity.

es_results_raw: Era un hombre muy tímido, señor Holmes. Prefería pasear conmigo por la noche que a la luz del día, porque decía que odiaba llamar la atención. Era muy reservado y caballeroso. Incluso su voz era suave. Me dijo que cuando era joven había padecido de una grave enfermedad que le había dejado una cicatriz en el rostro. A pesar de esto, nunca se quejó y siempre mostró una sonrisa tranquila. Me contó que había aprendido a vivir con su timidez y a valorar las pequeñas cosas en la vida. A menudo, nos sentábamos en silencio bajo las estrellas, y él me hablaba de la importancia de la amistad y la compasión. Aunque era introvertido, su presencia era reconfortante, y su paciencia me enseñó mucho sobre la empatía y la comprensión. A veces, cuando el viento soplaba suavemente, él me decía que recordaba los días en que podía caminar sin miedo, pero que ahora encontraba paz en la calma y la serenidad.

en_results_raw: Sherlock Holmes sat silent for a few minutes with his fingertips still pressed together, his legs stretched out in front of him, and his gaze directed upward to the ceiling. Then he took down from the rack the old, dusty magnifying glass, its surface etched with years of use. His eyes sparkled with a familiar intensity as he began to examine the intricate patterns on the glass. The room was filled with the faint scent of pipe tobacco and the soft hum of the city outside. His mind raced, already formulating theories and possibilities. The case that had eluded him for weeks was about to take a new turn. He could feel it in the air, a mixture of anticipation and excitement. The magnifying glass in his hand felt like a lifeline, a tool that would help him unravel the mystery. As he turned it over in his fingers, he noticed a faint scratch that hadn't been there before, a clue perhaps, hidden in plain sight. The detective's keen eyes narrowed, and he began to piece together the fragments of information that had been scattered before him.

vi_results_raw: Sherlock Holmes bắt đầu hút thuốc, hơi thở chậm rãi và đều đặn. Trong khi đó, tâm trí anh đang di chuyển nhanh chóng qua các chi tiết mà anh đã ghi nhận từ hiện trường. Anh nhớ lại từng bước đi, từng âm thanh, và từng ánh sáng trong căn phòng tối tăm. Những suy luận của anh dần dần được sắp xếp theo thứ tự logic, từng mảnh ghép dần hoàn chỉnh hình ảnh về vụ án. en_first_half: “The man married a woman very much older than himself for her money,” said he, “and he enjoyed the use of the money of the daughter as long as she lived with them. It was a considerable sum, for people in their position, and the loss of it would have made a serious difference. It was worth an effort to preserve it. The daughter was of a good, amiable disposition, but affectionate and warm-hearted in her ways, so that it was evident that with her fair personal advantages, and her little income, she would not be allowed to remain single long. Now her marriage would mean, of course, the loss of a hundred a year, so what does her stepfather do to prevent it? He takes the obvious course
en_second_half: of keeping her at home and forbidding her to seek the company of people of her own age. But soon he found that that would not answer forever. She became restive, insisted upon her rights, and finally announced her positive intention of going to a certain ball. What does her clever stepfather do then? He conceives an idea more creditable to his head than to his heart. With the connivance and assistance of his wife he disguised himself, covered those keen eyes with tinted glasses, masked the face with a moustache and a pair of bushy whiskers, sunk that clear voice into an insinuating whisper, and doubly secure on account of the girl’s short sight, he appears as Mr. Hosmer Angel, and keeps off other lovers by making love himself.”
en_results_raw: The stepfather, driven by his own financial desperation and the fear of losing the daughter's inheritance, decides to manipulate the situation. He begins by subtly undermining the daughter's relationship with potential suitors, spreading rumors about their backgrounds and intentions. He also starts to exert more control over her daily life, restricting her movements and social interactions. The daughter, initially unaware of her stepfather's true motives, finds herself increasingly isolated and anxious. Her mother, though aware of the stepfather's actions, is too concerned with her own financial stability to intervene effectively. As the daughter's prospects for marriage dwindle, she becomes more desperate and rebellious, leading to frequent arguments with her stepfather. The situation reaches a boiling point when the daughter discovers the extent of her stepfather's interference. She confronts him, demanding an explanation. The stepfather, caught off guard, attempts to justify his actions by claiming he is merely protecting her from a life of poverty. However, his explanation falls flat, and the daughter is left feeling betrayed and alone. The story takes a dark turn as the daughter begins to plot her own escape, determined to reclaim her independence and future. Her stepfather, realizing the gravity of the situation, tries to placate her, offering to make amends and restore her freedom. But the damage has been done, and the daughter is no longer willing to trust him. The tension between them grows, and the reader is left to wonder how this complex family dynamic will resolve itself.

Cô ta trở nên mạnh mẽ hơn, kiên quyết bảo vệ quyền lợi của mình và cuối cùng thì nói ra miệng ý định quả quyết sẽ tham dự một buổi khiêu vũ nào đó. Người cha dượng khôn ngoan của cô ta cần phải làm gì? Ông ta nghĩ ra một kế hoạch đáng khen về trí thông minh nhưng đáng trách về mặt tình cảm. Với sự đồng lõa và hỗ trợ của người vợ, ông ta tự cải trang, che giấu đôi mắt sắc bằng cặp kính râm, hóa trang khuôn mặt bằng một bộ ria và râu quai nón rậm rạp, hạ thấp giọng nói rõ ràng thành tiếng thì thào, cộng thêm một lợi thế an toàn là cô gái bị cận thị, ông ta đã xuất hiện dưới lốt chàng trai Hosmer Angel và gạt những chàng trai khác ra xa bằng cách tỏ tình với cô gái.”
vi_results_raw: completion>Người cha dượng đã quyết định can thiệp mạnh mẽ vào cuộc sống của cô con gái. Ông ta không chỉ ngăn cấm cô tham gia các hoạt động xã hội mà còn yêu cầu cô phải sống theo những quy tắc nghiêm ngặt mà ông ta đặt ra. Những quy tắc này bao gồm việc cô không được phép gặp gỡ bạn bè, không được phép đi ra ngoài một mình, và đặc biệt là không được phép kết hôn. Ông ta còn yêu cầu cô phải chuyển hết tài sản của mình vào tài khoản riêng của ông ta, và từ đó cô không được phép sử dụng bất kỳ khoản tiền nào.
es_first_half: "El hombre se casó con una mujer mucho mayor que él por su dinero -dijo-, y disfrutó del dinero de la hija mientras ella vivió con ellos. Era una suma considerable, para gente de su posición, y su pérdida habría supuesto una gran diferencia. Merecía la pena hacer un esfuerzo para conservarlo. La hija era de buena disposición, afable, pero cariñosa y afectuosa a su manera, de modo que era evidente que con sus buenas ventajas personales y sus escasos ingresos, no se le permitiría permanecer soltera por mucho tiempo. Ahora bien, su matrimonio significaría, por supuesto, la pérdida de cien dólares al año, así que ¿qué hace su padrastro para evitarlo? Toma la medida obvia de mantenerla en casa y prohibirle
es_second_half: que busque la compañía de personas de su edad. Pero pronto se dio cuenta de que eso no sería suficiente para siempre. Ella se inquieta, insiste en sus derechos y finalmente anuncia su intención de ir a un baile. ¿Qué hace entonces su inteligente padrastro? Concibe una idea más digna de su cabeza que de su corazón. Con la connivencia y la ayuda de su esposa se disfrazó, cubrió esos ojos agudos con gafas tintadas, enmascaró la cara con un bigote y un par de bigotes tupidos, hundió esa voz clara en un susurro insinuante, y doblemente protegido a causa de la corta vista de la chica, se presenta como el señor Hosmer Angel, y aleja a otros amantes al enamorarla él mismo."
es_results_raw: La joven no podía salir de casa sin la autorización de su padrastro. Él vigilaba cada paso que daba, asegurándose de que no se acercara a ciertas personas o lugares. Aunque la joven intentaba mantener una actitud positiva, la situación comenzaba a afectar su salud mental. Su padrastro argumentaba que estaba protegiéndola, pero ella sentía que estaba siendo tratada como una niña pequeña. Un día, mientras intentaba escribir una carta a su madre, que vivía lejos, fue sorprendida por su padrastro. Él le quitó el papel y la quemó frente a ella, diciéndole que no debía intentar comunicarse con su madre. La joven lloró desconsoladamente, pero sabía que no podía hacer nada. Sin embargo, poco tiempo después, un vecino que había visto lo que sucedía decidió intervenir. Este vecino, que era un abogado, decidió ayudar a la joven a presentar una demanda contra su padrastro. La joven, con el apoyo del vecino, comenzó a reunir pruebas y a preparar su caso. Finalmente, después de meses de lucha legal, la joven logró obtener una orden de protección contra su padrastro. Aunque la situación no era fácil, la joven comenzó a ver una luz al final del túnel. A medida que pasaban los días, sentía que estaba recuperando su libertad y su dignidad. El caso de la joven se convirtió en un ejemplo de cómo la ayuda de un vecino puede marcar la diferencia en la vida de alguien.
tr_first_half: "Adam sırf parası için kendinden çok yaşlı bir kadınla evlenir," diye söze başladı, "ve onlarla birlikte yaşadığı sürece, evin kızının parasını kullanmanın keyfini çıkarır. Onların konumundaki insanlar için önemli bir meblağ sayılabilecek bu paranın yokluğu, ciddi bir değişikliğe yol açabilir. Bu yüzden parayı korumak gerekir. Kız sevimli, iyi niyetli, duygusal ve sıcakkanlıdır; bu dürüst kişiliği ve küçük geliriyle birlikte uzun süre bekâr kalmasına izin verilmemelidir. en_first_half: “It may be so, or it may not, Mr. Holmes,” said he, “but if you are so very sharp you ought to be sharp enough to know that it is you who are breaking
en_second_half: the law now, and not me. I have done nothing actionable from the first, but as long as you keep that door locked you lay yourself open to an action for assault and illegal constraint.”
en_results_raw: It is you who are breaking the rules, Mr. Holmes,” I replied, my voice steady despite the growing tension in the room. “You think you can manipulate me with your deductions, but I’ve seen enough of your games to know when you’re pushing the boundaries. If you continue, I will have no choice but to call you out. The line between genius and madness is thinner than you might imagine, and I’m not willing to cross it for you, Mr. Holmes.”

vi_second_half: chứ không phải tôi. Ngay từ đầu tôi đã không làm điều gì khả dĩ bị kiện ra tòa, nhưng chừng nào ông còn khóa chặt cửa thì ông còn nguy cơ bị khởi tố vì tội tấn công và giam giữ người trái phép.
vi_results_raw: “Tôi không phải là kẻ phạm pháp, nhưng tôi cũng không phủ nhận rằng tôi đang theo dõi một điều gì đó không đúng. Điều này có thể dẫn đến một cuộc điều tra, và tôi chỉ đang tìm kiếm sự thật. Nếu tôi đã vi phạm pháp luật, thì tôi xin lỗi, nhưng tôi không có ý định làm điều đó. Tôi chỉ muốn hiểu rõ hơn về những gì đang xảy ra. Ông Holmes, tôi tin rằng chúng ta cùng nhau có thể giải quyết vấn đề này mà không cần đến sự can thiệp của pháp luật.” Hắn nói với vẻ nghiêm túc, nhưng trong mắt vẫn có chút lo lắng. “Tôi chỉ muốn biết liệu tôi có phải là kẻ phạm pháp hay không, và nếu có, thì tại sao lại như vậy. Tôi không muốn bị lừa dối, và tôi cũng không muốn lừa dối ai khác.”
es_first_half: "Puede que sea así, o puede que no, señor Holmes -dijo-, pero si es usted tan agudo debería serlo lo suficiente para saber que es usted quien está infringiendo la
es_second_half: ley ahora, y no yo. Yo no he hecho nada procesable desde el principio, pero mientras mantenga esa puerta cerrada se expone a una acción por agresión y coacción ilegal."
es_results_raw: ley. No hay duda de que usted ha estado espiando a la familia desde hace tiempo, y ahora está intentando justificar sus acciones. Si realmente es tan inteligente como dice ser, debería darse cuenta de que esto no puede terminar bien para usted. ¿Qué le hace pensar que puede salirse con esto impune? ¿Acaso cree que soy tan estúpido como para no haberme dado cuenta de sus movimientos? Por favor, señor Holmes, antes de seguir adelante, piense en las consecuencias de sus actos.

en_first_half: “Well, of course it was obvious from the first that this Mr. Hosmer Angel must have some strong object for his curious conduct, and it was equally clear that the only man who really profited by the incident, as far as we could see, was the stepfather. Then the fact that the two men were never together, but that the one always appeared when the other was away, was suggestive. So
en_second_half: were the tinted spectacles and the curious voice, which both hinted at a disguise, as did the bushy whiskers. My suspicions were all confirmed by his peculiar action in typewriting his signature, which, of course, inferred that his handwriting was so familiar to her that she would recognise even the smallest sample of it. You see all these isolated facts, together with many minor ones, all pointed in the same direction.”
en_results_raw: Mr. Hosmer Angel's actions had always been shrouded in mystery, and the townspeople could only speculate on the true nature of his intentions. The stepfather, on the other hand, seemed to thrive on the attention and the whispers that followed the unusual occurrences. It was as if he had orchestrated the entire situation, using Mr. Angel's visits as a means to gain notoriety. The townsfolk, divided in their opinions, found themselves torn between admiration for the stepfather's boldness and suspicion of his true motives. Some even whispered that he might have been using the situation to manipulate the community, exploiting the curiosity and gossip it generated. The more the town tried to unravel the mystery, the more complex it seemed to become, with every new piece of information leading to more questions. The only certainty was that the stepfather's influence over the town's dynamics had never been stronger, and the residents found themselves caught in a web of intrigue they could not escape.
vi_first_half: “À, tất nhiên rồi, điều dễ dàng nhận thấy ngay từ đầu là anh chàng Hosmer Angel hành động kì quặc như thế là có mục đích, và cũng rất rõ ràng là đối tượng duy nhất thực sự được hưởng lợi từ sự việc này, như chúng ta có thể thấy, chính là người cha dượng. Tiếp theo là đến chi tiết hai người đàn ông này chưa bao giờ xuất hiện cùng lúc, chính việc một người luôn luôn xuất hiện khi kẻ kia đi vắng đã nói lên rất nhiều điều. Cặp kính râm và giọng nói lạ lùng cũng thế, cả hai
vi_second_half: đều gợi ý đến một sự ngụy trang, cũng giống như bộ râu quai nón rậm rạp. Tất cả những mối nghi ngờ của tôi được khẳng định bởi hành động lập dị của hắn là dùng máy đánh chữ để kí tên, tất nhiên là từ đó mà tôi suy ra được rằng chữ viết của hắn phải rất quen thuộc với cô gái đến mức chỉ cần nhìn một vài chữ là cô ta có thể nhận ra ngay. Anh thấy đấy, tất cả các chi tiết riêng rẽ này, kết hợp với nhiều chi tiết nhỏ nhặt khác, đều chỉ về cùng một hướng.
vi_results_raw: À, rõ ràng là có một sự sắp đặt nào đó ở đây, và nó không chỉ dừng lại ở việc tạo ra sự bất ổn trong gia đình mà còn có thể ảnh hưởng đến cả tương lai của Hosmer Angel. Người cha dượng, với sự tinh vi của mình, đã tạo ra một tình huống mà anh ta có thể lợi dụng để đạt được mục tiêu của riêng mình. Điều này không chỉ làm suy yếu mối quan hệ giữa cha và con mà còn tạo ra một khoảng trống trong sự tin tưởng giữa các thành viên trong gia đình.
es_first_half: "Bueno, por supuesto era obvio desde el principio que este señor Hosmer Angel debía tener algún motivo de peso para su curiosa conducta, y estaba igualmente claro que el único hombre que realmente se benefició del incidente, por lo que pudimos ver, fue el padrastro. Además, el hecho de que los dos hombres no estuvieran nunca juntos, sino que uno apareciera siempre cuando el otro estaba ausente, era sugestivo. También lo
es_second_half: eran las gafas tintadas y la curiosa voz, que apuntaban a un disfraz, al igual que los tupidos bigotes. Mis sospechas se vieron confirmadas por su peculiar forma de escribir a máquina su firma, lo que, por supuesto, deducía que su letra le era tan familiar que reconocía hasta la más mínima muestra de ella. Como ve, todos estos hechos aislados, junto con muchos otros menores, apuntaban todos en la misma dirección."
es_results_raw: Bueno, por supuesto era obvio desde el principio que este señor Hosmer Angel debía tener algún motivo de peso para su curiosa conducta, y estaba igualmente claro que el único hombre que realmente se benefició del incidente, por lo que pudimos ver, fue el padrastro. Además, el hecho de que los dos hombres no estuvieran nunca juntos, sino que uno apareciera siempre cuando el otro estaba ausente, era sugestivo. También lo era el hecho de que el padrastro nunca mencionara a Hosmer Angel en su presencia, como si intentara mantenerlos separados deliberadamente. Esto llevó a la policía a investigar más a fondo la relación entre ambos. Las pruebas recopiladas mostraron que el padrastro había manipulado a Hosmer para que cometiera actos ilegales, a cambio de dinero y protección. A medida que la investigación avanzaba, se descubrió que el padrastro tenía antecedentes penales por abuso y explotación, lo que explicaba su actitud dominante y manipuladora. La policía decidió arrestarlo y presentarlo ante un tribunal, donde se esperaba que se revelaran más detalles sobre la relación tóxica entre ambos. La comunidad local se unió para apoyar a Hosmer, quien finalmente pudo comenzar una nueva vida lejos del control del padrastro.

Aunque la casa es grande, la sensación de abandono es evidente en los pasillos silenciosos y en las ventanas con cortinas desgastadas. A menudo, cuando la noche cae, siento una presencia extraña, como si los fantasmas de los antiguos dueños de la casa estuvieran rondando por los pasillos. He intentado explicárselo a mis amigos, pero ninguno parece creerme. A pesar de todo, sigo viviendo aquí, atraído por la historia y el misterio que rodea esta antigua residencia. Cada vez que me siento en la sala de estar, puedo imaginar las conversaciones que tuvieron lugar en este mismo lugar, hace ya mucho tiempo. Aunque la casa es tranquila durante el día, la noche es cuando realmente se siente la presencia de lo antiguo que hay en ella.

en_first_half: “Away we went then, and we drove for at least an hour. Colonel Lysander Stark had said that it was only seven miles, but I should think, from the rate that we seemed to go, and from the time that we took, that it must have been nearer twelve. He sat at my side in silence all the time, and I was aware, more than once when I glanced in his direction, that he was looking at me with great intensity. The country roads seem to be not very good in that part of the world, for we lurched and jolted terribly. I tried to look out of the windows to see something of where we were, but they were made of frosted glass, and I could make out nothing save the occasional bright blur
en_second_half: of a passing light. Now and then I hazarded some remark to break the monotony of the journey, but the colonel answered only in monosyllables, and the conversation soon flagged. At last, however, the bumping of the road was exchanged for the crisp smoothness of a gravel-drive, and the carriage came to a stand. Colonel Lysander Stark sprang out, and, as I followed after him, pulled me swiftly into a porch which gaped in front of us. We stepped, as it were, right out of the carriage and into the hall, so that I failed to catch the most fleeting glance of the front of the house. The instant that I had crossed the threshold the door slammed heavily behind us, and I heard faintly the rattle of the wheels as the carriage drove away.
en_results_raw: completion>The landscape outside the car was a blur of motion, the frosted glass offering no real insight into the world beyond. The only sounds were the steady hum of the engine and the occasional creak of the vehicle as it adjusted to the rough terrain. Colonel Stark's silence was unnerving, and I found myself glancing at him more frequently, trying to gauge his thoughts. His intense gaze made me feel exposed, as if he could see right through me. I wondered what he was thinking, if he knew more than he was letting on.
vi_first_half: “Chúng tôi lên đường và đi được ít nhất một giờ. Đại tá Lysander Stark nói là chỉ có bảy dặm nhưng tôi nghĩ, dựa vào tốc độ xe chạy và thời điểm chúng tôi khởi hành thì quãng đường phải lên đến gần mười hai dặm. Ông ta ngồi bên cạnh tôi và suốt chặng đường chẳng hề mở miệng, cứ mỗi lần liếc nhìn về phía ông ta, tôi lại thấy ông ta đang nhìn tôi với ánh mắt hết sức căng thẳng. Những con đường làng ở đoạn này có vẻ không được tốt lắm vì chúng tôi cứ bị lắc lư và xóc nẩy dữ dội. Tôi cố gắng nhìn ra ngoài cửa sổ để xem mình đang đi đến đâu nhưng kính cửa là loại thủy tinh đã mài mờ nên tôi chẳng phân biệt được gì ngoại trừ một vài vệt sáng lờ mờ thỉnh thoảng băng ngang qua. Có đôi lúc tôi đánh bạo
vi_second_half: đưa ra vài nhận xét để đánh tan sự đơn điệu của cuộc hành trình nhưng ông đại tá chỉ ậm ừ trả lời và cuộc đối thoại nhanh chóng trở nên nhạt nhẽo. Tuy vậy, cuối cùng thì đoạn đường dằn xóc cũng được thay thế bởi một lối đi rải sỏi êm ái và cỗ xe dừng lại. Đại tá Lysander Stark nhảy ra khỏi xe và khi tôi bước xuống theo thì ông ta nhanh chóng kéo tôi vào một cái cổng vòm đang mở rộng trước mặt chúng tôi. Vì cái cổng này nằm ngay sát cỗ xe ngựa và dẫn thẳng vào tiền sảnh nên tôi không có cơ hội để nhìn thoáng qua mặt tiền của căn nhà. Ngay khi tôi vừa bước qua ngưỡng cửa thì cánh cổng đã nặng nề đóng sập lại sau lưng và tôi chỉ loáng thoáng nghe thấy tiếng lọc cọc của bánh xe khi cỗ xe phóng đi.

Tôi bắt đầu cảm thấy lo lắng, không biết liệu chúng tôi có đang đi đúng hướng hay không. Đại tá Stark vẫn im lặng, chỉ gật đầu hoặc lắc đầu khi tôi hỏi một vài câu. es_first_half: "Nos fuimos entonces, y condujimos durante al menos una hora. El coronel Lysander Stark había dicho que sólo eran siete millas, pero yo creía, por la velocidad a la que parecíamos ir, y por el tiempo que tardamos, que debían ser más de doce. Se sentó a mi lado en silencio todo el tiempo, y me di cuenta, más de una vez cuando miré en su dirección, que me estaba mirando con gran intensidad. Parece que las carreteras rurales no son muy buenas en esa parte del mundo, porque dimos unos bandazos y sacudidas terribles. Intenté mirar por las ventanillas para ver algo de dónde estábamos, pero eran de vidrio esmerilado, y no pude distinguir nada más que el borrón ocasional de una luz que pasaba. De vez en
es_second_half: cuando me arriesgaba a hacer algún comentario para romper la monotonía del viaje, pero el coronel sólo respondía con monosílabos, y la conversación pronto decaía. Por fin, sin embargo, los golpes de la carretera fueron sustituidos por la crujiente suavidad de un camino de grava, y el carruaje se detuvo. El coronel Lysander Stark se bajó de él y, mientras yo lo seguía, me arrastró a un porche que se abría ante nosotros. Bajamos, por así decirlo, del carruaje y entramos en el vestíbulo, de modo que no pude echar la más fugaz mirada a la fachada de la casa. En el instante en que crucé el umbral, la puerta se cerró de golpe detrás de nosotros, y oí débilmente el traqueteo de las ruedas mientras el carruaje se alejaba."
es_results_raw: Nos detuvimos finalmente en un pequeño pueblo, donde el aire estaba impregnado del olor a carbón y aceite. El coronel Stark descendió del coche y se dirigió hacia una pequeña taberna que parecía ser el centro de la comunidad. Entró y, después de unos minutos, salió con una botella de licor que ofreció a mi padre. Aceptó y ambos se sentaron en una mesa apartada. Yo permanecí en el coche, observando cómo el tiempo parecía detenerse en ese lugar. La noche caía lentamente, y las luces de las casas se encendían una por una, creando un cuadro que me parecía ajeno a mi realidad. Cuando regresaron, el coronel Stark parecía más relajado, y mi padre, aunque no habló mucho, tenía una expresión que no había visto antes. Nos fuimos de nuevo, esta vez en silencio, y el viaje parecía más corto, aunque no entendía por qué. El coronel Stark no mencionó nada del pueblo ni de lo que habían hablado en la taberna. Yo, por mi parte, no pregunté. Al final del viaje, llegamos a un lugar que no esperaba: una granja rodeada de árboles altos y oscuros. El coronel Stark se detuvo y, sin decir una palabra, bajó del coche y caminó hacia la granja. Yo lo seguí, sintiendo una mezcla de curiosidad y miedo. La puerta de la granja estaba abierta, y cuando entré, vi a una mujer sentada en una silla, mirando hacia el horizonte. El coronel Stark se acercó a ella y, sin más, le entregó una carta. La mujer la tomó, la miró un instante y luego la guardó en su bolsa. No dijeron nada, y yo, confundido, salí de la granja y subí al coche. El viaje de regreso fue más rápido, y cuando llegamos a la ciudad, el coronel Stark me entregó una nota. "Leerla cuando estés solo", me dijo. Lo hice, y descubrí que era una invitación a una reunión secreta. Desde ese día, todo cambió. El coronel Stark desapareció, y yo, aunque no entendía por qué, seguí adelante, preguntándome si alguna vez sabría la verdad.

tr_second_half: puslu parlaklığıydı. Arada bir yolculuğun monoton havasını dağıtmak için bir iki laf etsem albay, tek kelimelik cevaplarla yetiniyor, böylece sohbet daha başlamadan bitiyordu. Neyse, sonunda bozuk yoldan kumlu düzgün bir yola çıktık. Az sonra fayton durdu. Albay Lysander Stark hemen dışarı fırladı. Arkasından indiğimde beni çabucak, açık duran bir kapıdan içeri itti. Arabadan inmiş ve hemen bir hole girmiştik, böylece evin önüne ait en ufak birşey dahi görememiştim. Kapıdan içeriye adım atar atmaz kapı arkamdan hızla kapandı, uzaklaşan arabanın belli belirsiz tekerlek tıngırtılarını duydum.

Bu ışıklar, bazen uzakta, bazen de yakından geçerken, yola olan dikkatimizi dağıtmıyordu. Albay Stark, her seferinde bu ışıkların ne olduğunu sormadı, ancak gözlerini onlara dikmişti. Yol boyunca, zaman zaman bir ses duyduk, ama bu seslerin nedeni belirsizdi. Belki de bir hayvan, belki de bir araba. Yolun sonunda, bir köy göründü. en_first_half: “It was pitch dark inside the house, and the colonel fumbled about looking for matches and muttering under his breath. Suddenly a door opened at the other end of the passage, and a long, golden bar of light shot out in our direction. It grew broader, and a woman appeared with a lamp in her hand, which she held above her head, pushing her face forward and peering at us. I could see that she was pretty, and from the gloss with which the light shone
en_second_half: upon her dark dress I knew that it was a rich material. en_results_raw: As the woman's face came into clearer view, I noticed the faintest hint of a smile playing on her lips, though it was hard to tell if it was genuine or forced. Her eyes, a striking shade of green, seemed to pierce through the darkness, searching for something—or someone—specific. The colonel, who had been standing still, suddenly straightened up, his voice trembling slightly as he addressed her, "Good evening, madam. We didn't expect to see anyone here tonight." The woman's gaze shifted to him, and for a moment, there was an unspoken tension in the air. She lowered the lamp slightly, her eyes narrowing as she studied him. "Colonel, isn't it? I believe we have some unfinished business." Her voice was calm, but there was an underlying tone of authority that made the colonel take a step back. "I assure you, madam, we mean you no harm. We were merely passing through." The woman's smile widened, though it still felt unsettling. "Passing through, you say? And yet, here you are, in my house, in the middle of the night. How convenient." The colonel swallowed hard, his hand instinctively reaching for the pocket where he kept his revolver. The woman noticed this movement and raised the lamp higher, her eyes gleaming in the dim light. "I wouldn't do that if I were you, Colonel. This house has its own rules, and I'm afraid you're not the only ones who have been passing through." The colonel's face paled, and he slowly lowered his hand. The woman's eyes flickered to me, and for the first time, I saw a flicker of recognition in them. "And who might you be, young man?" she asked, her voice soft but commanding. Tôi cố gắng trả lời, nhưng giọng nói của tôi run rẩy: "Thưa bà, chúng tôi chỉ là những người lạc đường. Chúng tôi không có ý định làm phiền." Tôi gật đầu, cảm thấy như mình vừa thoát khỏi một nguy hiểm nào đó. Bà ấy quay lưng đi, ánh sáng từ ngọn đèn của bà dần biến mất, để lại một không gian tối tăm và đầy bí ẩn. Tôi cố gắng nhìn xung quanh, nhưng không có gì khác ngoài sự im lặng và sự lạnh lẽo của căn phòng.
es_first_half: "Estaba muy oscuro dentro de la casa, y el coronel buscaba a tientas cerillas y murmuraba en voz baja. De repente se abrió una puerta en el otro extremo del pasillo y una larga barra de luz dorada salió disparada en nuestra dirección. Se ensanchó y apareció una mujer con una lámpara en la mano, que sostenía por encima de la cabeza, adelantando la cara y mirándonos. Pude ver que era guapa, y por el brillo con que la luz iluminaba
es_second_half: su vestido oscuro supe que era de un material rico. Pronunció algunas palabras en una lengua extranjera, en un tono como si estuviera haciendo una pregunta, y cuando mi compañero respondió con un monosílabo ronco, se sobresaltó tanto que la lámpara casi se le cayó de la mano. El coronel Stark se acercó a ella, le susurró algo al oído y luego, empujándola hacia la habitación de la que había salido, volvió a caminar hacia mí con la lámpara en la mano."
es_results_raw: La mujer con la lámpara avanzó lentamente hacia nosotros, su figura envuelta en la luz dorada que emanaba de la lámpara. Su rostro era impenetrable, pero había una extraña calma en sus ojos que contrastaba con la tensión que se había instalado en la estancia. El coronel, que aún sostenía las cerillas en una mano, se quedó inmóvil, como hipnotizado por la presencia de la desconocida. La luz de la lámpara iluminó el suelo de madera, creando sombras danzantes que parecían observarnos desde las esquinas. La mujer, sin decir una palabra, se detuvo a unos pasos de nosotros, y el silencio que siguió fue tan denso que parecía palpitar en el aire. Finalmente, con una voz que parecía provenir de muy lejos, dijo: "¿Qué hacéis aquí a estas horas?". El coronel, que aún no había dejado de murmurar, se sobresaltó y respondió: "Buscamos respuestas, señora. Respuestas que creemos que están aquí". La mujer asintió, y su rostro se iluminó ligeramente, como si hubiera esperado esa respuesta. "Entonces, seguidme", dijo, y giró sobre sus talones, dirigiéndose hacia el otro extremo del pasillo. El coronel y yo intercambiamos una mirada rápida, pero no hubo tiempo para más, ya que la mujer ya había desaparecido en la oscuridad. Nos apresuramos a seguir su camino, cada paso resonando en el silencio de la casa. La luz de la lámpara iluminaba brevemente el camino, pero no bastaba para disipar la oscuridad que nos rodeaba. A medida que avanzábamos, la casa parecía respirar, sus muros parecían moverse ligeramente, como si estuvieran vivos. El corazón me latía con fuerza en el pecho, y no podía dejar de preguntarme qué secretos ocultaba esa casa tan oscura y misteriosa.

The criminal news, with its tales of betrayal and violence, and the agony column, where people seek solace in shared pain, offer a glimpse into lives far removed from mine. Yet, in this solitude, I find a peculiar comfort, a quiet sanctuary from the chaos that seems to define the world beyond these pages.

I must prepare myself, for the stakes are high. The letter also mentions a new piece of legislation that is set to be introduced, one that could either unite or divide us. I will need to consider all angles before I can respond. This is not just a social call; it is a matter of great importance that requires my full attention.

Sé que usted es una persona de confianza, pero también sé que el mundo está lleno de ojos y oídos que esperan cualquier oportunidad para desestabilizar lo que considero un logro importante. Por eso, le pido que no solo se mantenga en silencio, sino que también me mantenga informado de cualquier movimiento que pueda poner en peligro esta corona. No quiero que se sienta presionado, pero también no puedo permitir que nada salga mal. Este es un trabajo que requiere discreción, pero también una vigilancia constante. Confío en usted, pero también en su capacidad para anticipar posibles problemas y actuar con rapidez y eficacia. Este es un reto que no puedo asumir solo, y espero que usted esté dispuesto a ayudarme a cumplir con esta tarea. Gracias por su disposición y por su confianza en mí.'

The once familiar streets of his town now felt foreign, and he found himself questioning everything he had ever believed in. Yet, amidst the turmoil, a small spark of hope flickered within him, urging him to seek answers and understand the reasons behind his misfortunes. He knew that this trial was not just about him but a chance to grow and perhaps emerge stronger, wiser, and more resilient.
